Module TowerDefense
Package models

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.GameRectangle
      • models.Mobile
        • models.Projectile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlainProjectile, ProjectileDecorator

    public abstract class Projectile
extends Mobile
    Abstract class used for the decorator design pattern for projectiles.
    Author:
    Ethan Parks
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Projectile

        public Projectile​(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double location,
                  java.awt.Dimension dimension,
                  double speed)
        Create projectile with the given location, dimension, and speed.
        Parameters:
        location - Screen coordinates of the projectile
        dimension - Size of the projectile
        speed - Distance to move the projectile each frame.
